Here are some other methods of tech support.

==== Instant Messenger Assistance ====
<nowiki>[[File:example-gaim.gif]]</nowiki>

You are also able to contact a member of the NewUser team by following the steps below:

* Click on Applications>Internet>Empathy IM Client/Pidgin Internet Messenger (depending on your version of Ubuntu) OR by pressing ALT + F2 on your keyboard, and typing in the window that opens "empathy" or "pidgin" then pressing enter.
* Click Buddies>Add Buddy>New Person (bottom left hand side on the new window,)>Select the account you wish to add the buddy from (MSN to MSN, or Yahoo! to Yahoo!)>Add the buddy screen name (see below for a list of available online help!)> Click Add.

* From here you will be able to see who is available for online assistance.

'''VOIP support via the Gizmo Project'''

* For more information about this nifty application please visit http://www.gizmoproject.com/
* Please note, you must have working headphones/speakers and microphone.

==== How to install and get support ====

* Download the '''Gizmo DEB Install Package''' at http://www.gizmoproject.com/download-linux.html
* Once prompted what you like to do, select GDebi package installer to open the file.
 <nowiki>[[File:gdebi.gif]]</nowiki>
* Click on '''install application''' and type in your administrator password.
* Once completed > Click on Applications > Internet > Gizmo Project
* Click on '''Register a new account''' (Services are free to register.)
* Add the following number for the Ubuntu Ohio Team conference # in the dial window at top.
* '''1-222-828-6886''' (1-222-ubuntu-o) and click dial.
 <nowiki>[[File:gizmo.gif]]</nowiki>
